headline.main: CHINESE TAKE TOLL AT YUNNAN BORDER; 1,000 Japanese-Thai Casualties Reported in Renewed Battle

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Feb. 1 (AP) -- More than 1,000 enemy troops have been killed or wounded in heavy fighting still in progress along the Burma-Yunnan border, the Chinese High Command asserted tonight.
abstract: both sides lose heavily in Yunnan border fighting; Chinese raid on Picheng reptd
